thread.title: Nobel laureate hopes prize will spur more inequality debate
thread.title_full: Video: Nobel laureate hopes prize will spur more inequality debate | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Nobel laureate hopes prize will spur more inequality debate
text: The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences was awarded to Angus Deaton, a Scottish-born scholar at Princeton University who has analyzed spending, poverty and welfare. The Nobel laureate joins Judy Woodruff to discuss his work and insight into inequality and society.
